h2_title: Where to Use the Buddha's Eyeball in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Defeating the Stone Vanguard will give you the Sterness of Stone Key Item needed to progress through Yellow Wind Ridge using the Tallies. Defeating Shigandang will give you the Skanda of Feeling") Key Item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Eyeball_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Eyeball Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Use the Buddha's Eyeball in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating the Stone Vanguard will give you the Sterness of Stone Key Item needed to progress through Yellow Wind Ridge using the Tallies. Defeating Shigandang will give you the Skanda of Feeling") Key Item.
